modules.title: Web Development
modules.description: Covers HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React fundamentals.

quiz.question: What does HTML stand for?
Which CSS property is used to change text color?
How do you include JavaScript in HTML?
Which method is used to add an element at the end of an array in JS?
What is the use of useState in React?
Which hook is used to perform side-effects in React?

modules.title: Software Engineering
modules.description: Introduction to the principles of software engineering, development methodologies, and best practices.

quiz.question: What does SDLC stand for?
Which methodology focuses on incremental development?
What is a UML diagram?
What is refactoring?
options: Changing the software design without affecting functionality
quiz.answer: Changing the software design without affecting functionality

quiz.question: Which tool is commonly used for version control?
Which of these is a popular Agile framework?

modules.title: Cyber Security
modules.description: Covers basic concepts of cyber security, threats, and defenses.

quiz.question: What does VPN stand for?
What is a DDoS attack?
What does ransomware do?
What is two-factor authentication?
options: A system that requires two forms of identification
quiz.answer: A system that requires two forms of identification

quiz.question: Which of these is a type of malware?
What is the main purpose of a firewall?
options: To protect systems from unauthorized access
quiz.answer: To protect systems from unauthorized access

modules.title: Networking
modules.description: Covers the fundamentals of computer networks, protocols, and network security.

quiz.question: What does TCP stand for?
Which protocol is used for secure communication on the internet?
What is an IP address?
What does DNS stand for?
Which of the following is a type of network topology?
What is the function of a router?
options: Send data to the same network

modules.title: Database Management
modules.description: An introduction to database design, normalization, and SQL querying.

quiz.question: What does SQL stand for?
What is normalization in a database?
Which SQL clause is used to filter records?
What is a primary key?
options: A unique identifier for each record in a table
A column used to filter records
quiz.answer: A unique identifier for each record in a table

quiz.question: Which SQL statement is used to delete data from a table?
What does the JOIN clause do in SQL?
options: Combines rows from two or more tables
quiz.answer: Combines rows from two or more tables
